Observe and Understand: With the ability to see through walls, I would use this power to observe and understand the daily lives of people around me. I would peek into their homes, workplaces, and social gatherings to gain insight into their thoughts, feelings, and motivations. This would help me to better empathize with others and form deeper connections.

Solve Mysteries: With the ability to see through walls, I would use this power to solve mysteries and uncover hidden secrets. I could observe people's movements and actions without them realizing, and piece together clues to solve crimes or uncover hidden agendas.

Improve Home Design: With the ability to see through walls, I would use this power to improve home design and maximize space efficiency. I could observe how people use their homes, identify areas of inefficiency, and suggest design changes to improve functionality and aesthetics.

Enhance Artistic Creativity: With the ability to see through walls, I would use this power to enhance my artistic creativity. I could observe the world around me in a new and unique way, inspiring new ideas and perspectives for my art.
